Title: Programming for Data Science with Python
Short Intro: Prepare for a data science career by learning the fundamental data programming tools: Python, SQL, command line, and git.
Skills: NumPy, Pandas, Control Flow, Python Scripting, Python Methods, Python Function Definition, Built-In Python Functions, SQL Queries, SQL JOINs, SQL Aggregations, Python Syntax, Python Package Management, Python Operators, Python IDEs, Python Exception Handling, Python Data Types, Python Data Structures
